options.content:
World Country Data

Population vs. Avg. Life Expectancy

  • Based on BigQuery Public data
  • Select Country Details

Country Population and Life Expectancy

(select country via count_name variable or by clicking on a bubble in the bubble chart)

options.onclick:
console.log(data.points[0]['text'])
let country_name = data.points[0]['text']
let href = 'https://play.grafana.org/d/_KUTfkjnk/gapminder-ish-hans-rosling?orgId=1&from=now-20y&to=now'
window.open(href + "&var-country_name=" + country_name, "_self")

targets.rawSql:
-- Panel: selected country details
with

population_data as (

    select
        parse_date('%Y', cast(p.year as string)) as year
        ,p.country_name
        ,p.midyear_population as current_year_population
        ,lag(p.midyear_population) over (partition by p.country_name order by year asc) as last_year_population
    from
        bigquery-public-data.census_bureau_international.midyear_population p
    where
        parse_date('%Y', cast(p.year as string)) <= date_trunc(current_date, year)

),

life_expectancy_data as (

    select
        parse_date('%Y', cast(e.year as string)) as year
        ,e.country_name
        ,e.life_expectancy
    from
        bigquery-public-data.census_bureau_international.mortality_life_expectancy e

),

final as (

    select
        cast(p.year as timestamp) as year
        ,p.country_name
        ,p.current_year_population
        ,p.last_year_population
        ,(1.0 * p.current_year_population / p.last_year_population) - 1 as population_growth_rate
        ,e.life_expectancy as average_life_expectancy
        ,case when p.country_name = '${country_name}' then 1 else 0 end as is_selected
    from
        population_data p
        left join life_expectancy_data e
            on p.country_name = e.country_name
            and p.year = e.year
    where
        $__timeFilter(cast(p.year as timestamp))
    qualify max(p.year) over (partition by 1) = p.year
    order by 1
)

select *
from final
order by is_selected

panels.title: Country Population Growth vs. Life Expectancy

targets.rawSql:
-- Panel: selected country population current year histogram

-- notes:
-- - check data in total_flag column?

with

population_5yr_data as (

    select
        parse_date('%Y', cast(p.year as string)) as year
        ,p.starting_age
        ,p.midyear_population as total_population
    from
        bigquery-public-data.census_bureau_international.midyear_population_5yr_age_sex p
    where
        p.country_name = '${country_name}'
        and p.total_flag = 'A'
    order by 1

),

histogram_data as (

    select
        p.year
        ,p.starting_age
        ,p.total_population
    from
        population_5yr_data p
    where
        $__timeFilter(cast(p.year as timestamp))
        and p.year <= '2022-01-01'

),

final as (

    -- also not sure that this works...
    select *
    from histogram_data
    qualify year = max(year) over (partition by 1)

)

select *
from final
order by 2

-- Panel: selected country population by year

with 

population_data as (

    select
        parse_date('%Y', cast(p.year as string)) as year
        ,p.country_name
        ,p.midyear_population as current_year_population
        ,lag(p.midyear_population) over (partition by p.country_name order by year asc) as last_year_population
    from
        bigquery-public-data.census_bureau_international.midyear_population p
    where
        parse_date('%Y', cast(p.year as string)) <= date_trunc(current_date, year)

)

select
    cast(p.year as timestamp) as year
    ,p.current_year_population as total_population
from
    population_data p
where
    $__timeFilter(cast(p.year as timestamp))
    and p.country_name = '${country_name}'
    and p.year <= '2022-01-01'
order by 1

-- Panel: selected country details
with

population_data as (

    select
        parse_date('%Y', cast(p.year as string)) as year
        ,p.country_name
        ,p.midyear_population as current_year_population
        ,lag(p.midyear_population) over (partition by p.country_name order by year asc) as last_year_population
    from
        bigquery-public-data.census_bureau_international.midyear_population p
    where
        parse_date('%Y', cast(p.year as string)) <= date_trunc(current_date, year)

),

life_expectancy_data as (

    select
        parse_date('%Y', cast(e.year as string)) as year
        ,e.country_name
        ,e.life_expectancy
    from
        bigquery-public-data.census_bureau_international.mortality_life_expectancy e

),

final as (

    select
        cast(p.year as timestamp) as year
        ,p.country_name
        ,p.current_year_population
        ,p.last_year_population
        ,(1.0 * p.current_year_population / p.last_year_population) - 1 as population_growth_rate
        ,e.life_expectancy as average_life_expectancy
        ,case when p.country_name = '${country_name}' then 'rgb(222, 182, 242)' else 'rgb(204, 204, 220)' end as color
    from
        population_data p
        left join life_expectancy_data e
            on p.country_name = e.country_name
            and p.year = e.year
    where
        $__timeFilter(cast(p.year as timestamp))
    qualify max(p.year) over (partition by 1) = p.year
    order by 1
)

select *
from final
order by color

panels.title: [Temp (new XY Chart)] Country Population Growth vs. Life Expectancy

query.rawSql:
-- grafana variable setup

select
    distinct country_name
from
    bigquery-public-data.census_bureau_international.country_names_area
order by 1
